description: Father Sergiy is refusing to leave a convent near Yekaterinburg after seizing it with armed guards.
title: Coronavirus-denying Father Sergiy expelled by Russian Church
title_page: Coronavirus-denying Father Sergiy expelled by Russian Church - BBC News
maintext: The former residents said children were slapped or beaten for minor misdemeanours. Punishment was meted out for example if a girl took off her headscarf while hauling a sack of potatoes early in the morning, or if a child ran through the woods into town to get some chocolate.
